column1: Dehui (Chinese: 德惠; pinyin: Déhuì) is a county-level city of Jilin Province
column3: it is under the administration of the prefecture-level city of Changchun
column4: located in the middle of the Songliao Plain. It has a total population of 906
column9: it is around 80 kilometres (50 mi) north-northeast of central Changchun. It borders Yushu to the northeast
column13: as well as the prefecture-level cities of Jilin to the southeast and Songyuan to the northwest.
